name: Puzzle Bundle: 3 in 1
summary: Highrise Heroes: Word Challenge - A towering word-game and mystery-story adventure! Give your brain a workout with this charming word puzzle game. Note: Supports English (US and UK) words only. Swapperoo - The friendly puzzle game intent on your defeat. The rules are simple: tap an arrow to move it in the direction it faces. Make a row of 3 tiles of the same color and the tiles disappear. If that sounds too easy, don't worry - you'll find yourself in situations that require clever manipulation of the game board. Quell Zen - the very embodiment of relaxing logic games - features over 200 beautifully crafted challenges. Set against a narrative of a Japanese family divided, Quell Zen will take you on an unforgettable journey. Step inside this beautiful world today.
